original: Ekholm, Carl Gustav, direktör, Lidköping, f. 13/4/90 i Blomskog, Värml. 1., av Carl Aug. E. o. Alida Johnson. G. 28 m. Greta Rosén. Barn: Lennart f. 31. — Aff:res. t. USA 21-22 o. 47 o. t. de fl. eur. länd. v. ol. tillf. Verkst. dir. v. Lidköp. Mek. Verkst. sed. 35, styr :led. där o. i Grafiska Maskin A-B i Sthlm, i Lidköp. ’Sparb., i Lidköp. yrkessk. RVO, FFrK, Patr-SM.
translated: Ekholm, Carl Gustav, Director, Lidköping, b. 13/4/90 in Blomskog, Värmland, 1st child of Carl August Ekholm and Alida Johnson. Married in 1928 to Greta Rosén, they have one child, Lennart, born in 1931. Carl Gustav worked as a businessman in the USA during 1921-22 and 1947 and throughout several European countries on other occasions. He is currently the Managing Director of Lidköpings Mekaniska Verkstad since 1935 and is a board member in the same company as well as in Grafiska Maskin AB in Stockholm and Lidköpings Sparbank. He received the Royal Order of the Vasa, the French Legion of Honour, and is also a Patron of the Swedish Motorcyclists' Association.

structured.name: Carl Gustav Ekholm
structured.description: Carl Gustav Ekholm was a Swedish director who was born on April 13, 1890 in Blomskog, Värmland. He was the first child of Carl August Ekholm and Alida Johnson. In 1928, he got married to Greta Rosén, and they had one child, Lennart, who was born in 1931. Carl Gustav worked as a businessman in the USA during 1921-22 and 1947 and throughout several European countries on other occasions. He is currently the Managing Director of Lidköpings Mekaniska Verkstad since 1935 and is a board member in the same company as well as in Grafiska Maskin AB in Stockholm and Lidköpings Sparbank. He received the Royal Order of the Vasa, the French Legion of Honour, and is also a Patron of the Swedish Motorcyclists' Association.
